2822.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_ALL_TEMPORARILY
2822.message:
This Nintendo Network ID
cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2822.short_description: Your PNID is temporarily banned from all aspects of the network
2822.long_description:
The account you are trying to use has been temporarily banned from all aspects of the network. This includes, but is not limited to:

- Miiverse
- Game servers
- 3rd party services which opt-in to respecting network bans.
2822.short_solution: Wait for the ban to expire
2822.long_solution: Wait for the ban to expire or appeal it on the forum.
